data.description: Instead of setting the infill density as a percentage, it is also possible to set the line distance. This determines the distance between each infill line, which has the same effect as changing the infill density.
data.img_description: The model on the left has a bigger infill line distance than the model on the right.
data.hints: - Setting the line distance gives an indication on the distance that flat top layers on top of infill have to bridge.
